action.action-desc: Mr. Crenshaw introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To prohibit funding for the implementation and enforcement of Federal red flag orders.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Preventing Unjust Red Flag Laws Act of 2025.

section.header: Prohibition on funding for implementation and enforcement of red flag laws or rules

subsection.text: None of the funds made available for any Federal department or agency may be used toâ€”

paragraph.text: implement or enforce Federal red flag laws; or
provide assistance to States, local, tribal, or territorial government departments or agencies for the implementation or enforcement of red flag laws.

subsection.text: In this section, the term red flag law means a risk-based, temporary, and preemptive protective order that authorizes the removal of a firearm without due process.
